Methods in sagma.core.math with parameters of type Vec4

This method does NOT affect the contents of this vector

          Multiplies this quaternion with another quaternion
 Vec3 Vec3.subtract(Vec4 v)
          
Subtracts this vector by a Quaternion which we be automatically converted into a Vector
This method does NOT alter this vector's value
